sentences.en: Britain has already frozen its aid programme.
sentences.cn: 英国已冻结了其援助项目。

sentences.en: Diplomatic relations were frozen until August this year.
sentences.cn: 外交关系直到今年8月才解冻。

sentences.en: Frozen fish is a very healthy convenience food.
sentences.cn: 冻鱼是非常健康的方便食品。

sentences.en: He put one hand up to his frozen face.
sentences.cn: 他用一只手捂在冰冷的脸上。

sentences.en: I'm frozen to the bone out here.
I've gotten my feet thoroughly soaked and feel frozen through and through.
sentences.cn: 我双脚湿透，感觉都冻到骨头里了。

sentences.en: It was bitterly cold now and the ground was frozen hard.
sentences.cn: 现在天气冷极了，地面都冻硬了。

sentences.en: Place the frozen rolls on a greased baking tray.
sentences.cn: 将冷冻的肉卷放到抹了油的烤盘上。

sentences.en: polar bears, denizens of the frozen north
sentences.cn: 北极熊，在冰天雪地的北方生活的动物

sentences.en: The lakes are still frozen over.
They all stood there staring, as if frozen to the spot.
sentences.cn: 他们都站在那儿发愣，就像被冻在那里似的。

sentences.en: Under these laws, he said, Mr. Rice's assets could have been frozen.
sentences.cn: 他说根据这些法规，赖斯先生的资产可能已经被冻结了。

sentences.en: Wages have been frozen and workers laid off.
sentences.cn: 工资已被冻结，工人也下岗了。

sentences.en: You can use fresh or frozen fish.
sentences.cn: 你可以使用新鲜或冷冻的鱼。

words.tran_cn: [制冷][气象][生物][经]冻结的；[食品]冷酷的
[气象]结冰（freeze的过去分词）；凝固；变得刻板

trans.tran_cn: 冷冻的，冰封的，冻硬的，呆若木鸡的
trans.tran_en: frozen food has been stored at a very low temperature in order to preserve it

trans.tran_cn: 结冰（ freeze的过去分词），冷藏，冻结，冻住
